_header: O mortal man remember night and day
_description: ‘Memento homo quod cinis est’, ‘Quod Lichtoun’ — six 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with this refrain

Banna.First Lines:
O mortall man remembir nycht and dayHow schort the tyme is þat
                    thow hes heir to spend…
Banna.Last Lines:
…he is sa gracius evir aboif mesourMemento homo quod cinis
                    Es
